summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 7 November to end of Sunday 7 November GMT
description: Sunday is forecast to overcast with a fresh north-westerly breeze for most of the day.<br/><br/>It's expected there will be good dispersion of particulates emitted from any Guy Fawkes firework displays and bonfires.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
